price: Kamar wancan ne Muke lãbartãwa* a gare ka, daga lãbãran abin da ya gabãta, alhãli kuwa haƙĩƙa, Mun bã ka zikiri (Alƙur'ãni) daga gun Mu.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدۡ سَبَقَۚ وَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكۡرٗا
footnotes: * Yã kãwo ƙãrin bayãni game da wannan ƙissa a cikin ãyõyin da ke tafe daga nan yadda bin addinin Allah yake da sauƙi a cikin lõkaci gajere na dũniya kawai a cikin taƙaitaccen lõkaci, da kuma wuyar bautawa wani ga ɗaukar kãya mãsu nauyi a dũniya da Lãhira, a cikin dõgon lõkaci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika naquṣṣu ʿalayka min anbāi mā qad sabaqa waqad ātaynāka min ladunnā dhik'ran
